title: Amazon Basic Care Daytime Cold and Flu Relief Softgels, Non-Drowsy Cold Medicine, Relief of Pain, Fever, Cough, Sore Throat, Nasal Congestion, 24 Count
features: ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: This cold medicine contains acetaminophen (pain reliever/fever reducer), dextromethorphan HBr (cough suppressant) and phenylephrine HCl (nasal decongestant). Compare to the active ingredients in Vicks DayQuil Cold & Flu LiquiCaps.
MULTI-SYMPTOM RELIEF: This cold remedy temporarily relieves headache, fever, sore throat, minor aches and pains, nasal congestion and cough due to the common cold and flu.
PAIN RELIEVER AND FEVER REDUCER: Cold relief medicine temporarily relieves minor aches and pains, headache, fever and sore throat due to the common cold and flu.

COUGH SUPPRESSANT: Choose the right cold remedy for your cough during cold and flu season. This product acts as a cough suppressant to temporarily relieve coughing due to minor throat and bronchial irritation.
NASAL DECONGESTANT: Cold and flu season often brings nasal congestion as a symptom. This cold relief medicine will help temporarily relieve this symptom.
